title: Microsoft's Hyperlight WebAssembly for VMs Is Open Source
author: B Cameron Gain
description: Hyperlight is a Rust library built to allow developers to leverage kernel-based virtual machines or Hyper-V — a Microsoft-native hypervisor — to run untrusted code in a micro VM without loading a full operating system.
cntitle: 微软的 Hyperlight WebAssembly 虚拟机开源
cndescription: Hyperlight 是一个 Rust 库，允许开发者利用基于内核的虚拟机或 Hyper-V（微软原生的虚拟机管理程序）在微型虚拟机中运行不受信任的代码，无需加载完整的操作系统。
